PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-04192010-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY,  CSA
ActCanadian Space Agency Act
SubjectMOU with Nova Scotia re: Canadian Space Program
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Industry and the Minister Responsible for the Canadian Space Agency (CSA) to enter into a Memorandum of Understanding with the Ministry of Education of Nova Scotia for the purpose of carrying out collaborative activities to encourage increased scientific literacy among educators and students in Nova Scotia through increased access to CANADIAN SPACE PROGRAM learning content and professional development opportunities. The CSA will also grant Nova Scotia a license to copy and distribute CSA Space Learning curricular materials in perpetuity to all relevant classrooms across the province of Nova Scotia.
AttachmentsAttachment
